'''v0.16.0 alpha build 2'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2016/09/0160-beta-build-numbers.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: 0.16.0 beta build numbers|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref><ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15667</ref> (labelled '''v0.15.90 alpha build 1''' in-game and '''0.15.90.1'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2016/09/0160-beta-build-numbers.html|title=0.16.0 beta build numbers|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> internally) is the second build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.16.0 alpha|v0.16.0]], also known as the [[Boss Update]]. It mainly removes the [[Minecraft Education|Education Edition]] features which were accidentally added in [[Pocket Edition v0.16.0 alpha build 1|the previous build]].

== Changed ==
* [[Border]] block, [[chalkboard]], [[camera]] and [[portfolio]] completely removed
* Removed the [[NPC]] [[spawn egg]] from the [[Creative]] [[inventory]].</onlyinclude>
